<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 576 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

---

Before it’s activated, this item appears to be an ash rod capped with steel on either end.
